text: What if you could watch a UI generate in real-time as you work with AI? Now you can, with Real Time UI in MagicPath. This is extremely hard to do, especially for interactive React components with states. That’s why you don’t see this anywhere else. This is a first.
author: Pietro Schirano

text: everyday around lunchtime we all hop in the # food-ideas channel where Claude acts as a mediator to to help us figure out where to go for lunch
author: Sharif Shameem

text: Yondr makes these pouches that lock up smartphones. Interesting business: launched in 2015, it sold 25k units first year (popularized for Dave Chapelle comedy sets). In 2024, it sold 10m pouches at $30 a pop for sales of $300m (schools are ~70% of sales).
author: Trung Phan

text: Big update: we’re building an AI device that looks like jewelry, not another screen or plastic gadget. Yes, hardware is hard. But AI doesn’t belong in a browser forever. More soon. Follow along
